description: Automate GoHighLevel across CRM, messaging, calendars, marketing, e-commerce, and billing. Manage contacts, conversations, opportunities, appointments, invoices, and payments from a single workflow. Accelerate operations with bulk updates, smart upserts, and powerful search.

apiKey.description: Private Integration API key from GoHighLevel. Navigate to Settings > Integrations > Private API Key to create one.

baseUrl.description: Override the GoHighLevel API base URL.

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location/sub-account ID. Copy the alphanumeric value from the app URL when the location is selected.

skipConnectionTest.description: Skip the startup API connectivity check.

tools.name: create_contact
tools.description: Create a new contact in GoHighLevel

tools.name: search_contacts
tools.description: Search for contacts with advanced filtering options

tools.name: get_contact
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific contact

tools.name: update_contact
tools.description: Update contact information

tools.name: delete_contact
tools.description: Delete a contact from GoHighLevel

tools.name: add_contact_tags
tools.description: Add tags to a contact

tools.name: remove_contact_tags
tools.description: Remove tags from a contact

tools.description: Get all tasks for a contact

tools.description: Create a new task for a contact

assignedTo.description: User ID to assign task to

tools.description: Get a specific task for a contact

tools.description: Update task completion status

tools.description: Get all notes for a contact

tools.description: Get a specific note for a contact

tools.description: Update a note for a contact

tools.description: Delete a note for a contact

tools.description: Create or update contact based on email/phone (smart merge)

assignedTo.description: User ID to assign contact to

tools.description: Check for duplicate contacts by email or phone

tools.name: get_contacts_by_business
tools.description: Get contacts associated with a specific business

tools.name: get_contact_appointments
tools.description: Get all appointments for a contact

tools.name: bulk_update_contact_tags
tools.description: Bulk add or remove tags from multiple contacts

removeAllTags.description: Remove all existing tags before adding new ones

tools.name: bulk_update_contact_business
tools.description: Bulk update business association for multiple contacts

businessId.description: Business ID (null to remove from business)

tools.name: add_contact_followers
tools.description: Add followers to a contact

followers.description: Array of user IDs to add as followers

tools.name: remove_contact_followers
tools.description: Remove followers from a contact

followers.description: Array of user IDs to remove as followers

tools.description: Add contact to a marketing campaign

tools.description: Remove contact from a specific campaign

tools.description: Remove contact from all campaigns

tools.description: Add contact to a workflow

tools.name: remove_contact_from_workflow
tools.description: Remove contact from a workflow

tools.name: send_sms
tools.description: Send an SMS message to a contact in GoHighLevel

message.description: The SMS message content to send

contactId.description: The unique ID of the contact to send SMS to

fromNumber.description: Optional: Phone number to send from (must be configured in GHL)

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Send an email message to a contact in GoHighLevel

html.description: HTML email content (optional, takes precedence over message)

emailCc.description: Optional: Array of CC email addresses

emailBcc.description: Optional: Array of BCC email addresses

contactId.description: The unique ID of the contact to send email to

emailFrom.description: Optional: Email address to send from (must be configured in GHL)

tools.name: search_conversations
tools.description: Search conversations in GoHighLevel with various filters

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to return (default: 20, max: 100)

contactId.description: Filter conversations for a specific contact

assignedTo.description: Filter by user ID assigned to conversations

tools.name: get_conversation
tools.description: Get detailed conversation information including message history

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to return (default: 20)

conversationId.description: The unique ID of the conversation to retrieve

tools.name: create_conversation
tools.description: Create a new conversation with a contact

contactId.description: The unique ID of the contact to create conversation with

tools.name: update_conversation
tools.description: Update conversation properties (star, mark read, etc.)

unreadCount.description: Set the unread message count (0 to mark as read)

conversationId.description: The unique ID of the conversation to update

tools.name: get_recent_messages
tools.description: Get recent messages across all conversations for monitoring

limit.description: Maximum number of conversations to check (default: 10)

tools.name: delete_conversation
tools.description: Delete a conversation permanently

conversationId.description: The unique ID of the conversation to delete

tools.name: get_email_message
tools.description: Get detailed email message information by email message ID

emailMessageId.description: The unique ID of the email message to retrieve

tools.name: get_message
tools.description: Get detailed message information by message ID

messageId.description: The unique ID of the message to retrieve

tools.name: upload_message_attachments
tools.description: Upload file attachments for use in messages

attachmentUrls.description: Array of file URLs to upload as attachments

conversationId.description: The conversation ID to upload attachments for

tools.description: Update the delivery status of a message

messageId.description: The unique ID of the message to update

recipients.description: Email delivery status for additional recipients

emailMessageId.description: Email message ID if updating email status

tools.description: Manually add an inbound message to a conversation

type.description: Type of inbound message to add

conversationId.description: The conversation to add the message to

conversationProviderId.description: Conversation provider ID for the message

tools.description: Manually add an outbound call record to a conversation

tools.description: Get call transcription text for a message

messageId.description: The unique ID of the call message to get transcription for

tools.description: Download call transcription as a text file

messageId.description: The unique ID of the call message to download transcription for

tools.name: cancel_scheduled_message
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled message before it is sent

messageId.description: The unique ID of the scheduled message to cancel

tools.name: cancel_scheduled_email
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled email before it is sent

emailMessageId.description: The unique ID of the scheduled email to cancel

tools.name: live_chat_typing
tools.description: Send typing indicator for live chat conversations

isTyping.description: Whether the agent is currently typing

visitorId.description: Unique visitor ID for the live chat session

conversationId.description: The conversation ID for the live chat

tools.name: create_blog_post
tools.description: Create a new blog post in GoHighLevel. Requires blog ID, author ID, and category IDs which can be obtained from other blog tools.

tags.description: Optional array of tags for the blog post

author.description: Author ID (use get_blog_authors to find available authors)

blogId.description: Blog site ID (use get_blog_sites to find available blogs)

status.description: Publication status of the blog post

content.description: Full HTML content of the blog post

urlSlug.description: URL slug for the blog post (use check_url_slug to verify availability)

imageUrl.description: URL of the featured image for the blog post

categories.description: Array of category IDs (use get_blog_categories to find available categories)

description.description: Short description/excerpt of the blog post

publishedAt.description: Optional ISO timestamp for publication date (defaults to now for PUBLISHED status)

imageAltText.description: Alt text for the featured image (for SEO and accessibility)

tools.name: update_blog_post
tools.description: Update an existing blog post in GoHighLevel. All fields except postId and blogId are optional.

blogId.description: Blog site ID that contains the post

content.description: Updated HTML content of the blog post

urlSlug.description: Updated URL slug (use check_url_slug to verify availability)

description.description: Updated description/excerpt of the blog post

publishedAt.description: Updated ISO timestamp for publication date

imageAltText.description: Updated alt text for the featured image

tools.name: get_blog_posts
tools.description: Get blog posts from a specific blog site. Use this to list and search existing blog posts.

limit.description: Number of posts to retrieve (default: 10, max recommended: 50)

blogId.description: Blog site ID to get posts from (use get_blog_sites to find available blogs)

offset.description: Number of posts to skip for pagination (default: 0)

searchTerm.description: Optional search term to filter posts by title or content

tools.name: get_blog_sites
tools.description: Get all blog sites for the current location. Use this to find available blogs before creating or managing posts.

skip.description: Number of blogs to skip for pagination (default: 0)

searchTerm.description: Optional search term to filter blogs by name

tools.name: get_blog_authors
tools.description: Get all available blog authors for the current location. Use this to find author IDs for creating blog posts.

offset.description: Number of authors to skip for pagination (default: 0)

tools.name: get_blog_categories
tools.description: Get all available blog categories for the current location. Use this to find category IDs for creating blog posts.

offset.description: Number of categories to skip for pagination (default: 0)

tools.name: check_url_slug
tools.description: Check if a URL slug is available for use. Use this before creating or updating blog posts to ensure unique URLs.

postId.description: Optional post ID when updating an existing post (to exclude itself from the check)

urlSlug.description: URL slug to check for availability

tools.name: search_opportunities
tools.description: Search for opportunities in GoHighLevel CRM using various filters like pipeline, stage, contact, status, etc.

limit.description: Maximum number of opportunities to return (default: 20, max: 100)

query.description: General search query (searches name, contact info)

pipelineStageId.description: Filter by specific pipeline stage ID

tools.name: get_pipelines
tools.description: Get all sales pipelines configured in GoHighLevel

locationId.description: Optional location ID to override the default location configured in the server. If not provided, uses the location from configuration.

tools.name: get_opportunity
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific opportunity by ID

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity to retrieve

tools.name: create_opportunity
tools.description: Create a new opportunity in GoHighLevel CRM

status.description: Initial status of the opportunity (default: open)

contactId.description: ID of the contact associated with this opportunity

assignedTo.description: User ID to assign this opportunity to

pipelineId.description: ID of the pipeline this opportunity belongs to

monetaryValue.description: Monetary value of the opportunity in dollars

tools.name: update_opportunity_status
tools.description: Update the status of an opportunity (won, lost, etc.)

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity

tools.name: delete_opportunity
tools.description: Delete an opportunity from GoHighLevel CRM

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity to delete

tools.name: update_opportunity
tools.description: Update an existing opportunity with new details (full update)

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity to update

tools.name: upsert_opportunity
tools.description: Create or update an opportunity based on contact and pipeline (smart merge)

contactId.description: ID of the contact associated with this opportunity

assignedTo.description: User ID to assign this opportunity to

pipelineId.description: ID of the pipeline this opportunity belongs to

monetaryValue.description: Monetary value of the opportunity in dollars

tools.description: Add followers to an opportunity for notifications and tracking

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity

tools.name: remove_opportunity_followers
tools.description: Remove followers from an opportunity

followers.description: Array of user IDs to remove as followers

opportunityId.description: The unique ID of the opportunity

tools.name: get_calendar_groups
tools.description: Get all calendar groups in the GoHighLevel location

locationId.description: Optional location ID to override the default location configured in the server. If not provided, uses the location from configuration.

tools.name: get_calendars
tools.description: Get all calendars in the GoHighLevel location with optional filtering

tools.name: create_calendar
tools.description: Create a new calendar in GoHighLevel

groupId.description: Calendar group ID to organize the calendar

hours.description: One or more opening windows for the specified days

openHours.description: Weekly availability configuration for the calendar

teamMembers.description: Team members assigned to the calendar

slotDuration.description: Duration of appointment slots in minutes (default: 30)

availabilities.description: Availability rules for the calendar (e.g., specific dates or recurring patterns)

allowReschedule.description: Allow clients to reschedule appointments (default: true)

allowCancellation.description: Allow clients to cancel appointments (default: true)

locationId.description: Location ID

tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific calendar by ID

calendarId.description: The unique ID of the calendar to retrieve

slug.description: Updated URL slug for the calendar

hours.description: One or more opening windows for the specified days

openHours.description: Updated weekly availability configuration for the calendar

calendarId.description: The unique ID of the calendar to update

teamMembers.description: Updated team members assigned to the calendar

slotDuration.description: Updated duration of appointment slots in minutes

availabilities.description: Updated availability rules for the calendar (e.g., specific dates or recurring patterns)

locationId.description: Location ID

locationConfigurations.description: Updated location-specific configurations for the calendar

tools.description: Delete a calendar from GoHighLevel

calendarId.description: The unique ID of the calendar to delete

tools.name: get_calendar_events
tools.description: Get appointments/events from calendars within a date range

userId.description: Filter events by assigned user ID

endTime.description: End time in milliseconds or ISO date (e.g., "2024-01-31" or "1706745599999")

groupId.description: Filter events by calendar group ID

startTime.description: Start time in milliseconds or ISO date (e.g., "2024-01-01" or "1704067200000")

calendarId.description: Filter events by specific calendar ID

tools.name: get_free_slots
tools.description: Get available time slots for booking appointments on a specific calendar

userId.description: Specific user ID to check availability for

endDate.description: End date for availability check (YYYY-MM-DD format or milliseconds)

startDate.description: Start date for availability check (YYYY-MM-DD format or milliseconds)

calendarId.description: The calendar ID to check availability for

tools.name: create_appointment
tools.description: Create a new appointment/booking in GoHighLevel

contactId.description: The contact ID for whom to book the appointment

calendarId.description: The calendar ID to book the appointment in

assignedUserId.description: User ID to assign this appointment to

ignoreDateRange.description: Ignore minimum scheduling notice and date range restrictions

tools.description: Update an existing blocked time slot

tools.description: Get list of files and folders from the media library with filtering and search capabilities

altId.description: Location or Agency ID (uses default location if not provided)

limit.description: Number of files to show in the listing (max 100)

query.description: Search query text to filter files by name

offset.description: Number of files to skip in listing

sortBy.description: Field to sort the file listing by (e.g., createdAt, name, size)

parentId.description: Parent folder ID to list files within a specific folder

sortOrder.description: Direction to sort files (asc or desc)

tools.name: upload_media_file
tools.description: Upload a file to the media library or add a hosted file URL (max 25MB for direct uploads)

name.description: Custom name for the uploaded file

altId.description: Location or Agency ID (uses default location if not provided)

hosted.description: Set to true if providing a fileUrl instead of direct file upload

fileUrl.description: URL of hosted file (required if hosted=true)

parentId.description: Parent folder ID to upload file into

tools.name: delete_media_file
tools.description: Delete a specific file or folder from the media library

id.description: ID of the file or folder to delete

altId.description: Location or Agency ID (uses default location if not provided)

tools.name: get_all_objects
tools.description: Get all objects (custom and standard) for a location including contact, opportunity, business, and custom objects

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

tools.name: create_object_schema
tools.description: Create a new custom object schema with labels, key, and primary display property

key.description: Unique key for the object (e.g., "custom_objects.pet"). The "custom_objects." prefix is added automatically if not included

labels.description: Singular and plural names for the custom object

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

tools.name: get_object_schema
tools.description: Get object schema details by key including all fields and properties for custom or standard objects

key.description: Object key (e.g., "custom_objects.pet" for custom objects, "contact" for standard objects)

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

fetchProperties.description: Whether to fetch all standard/custom fields of the object

tools.name: update_object_schema
tools.description: Update object schema properties including labels, description, and searchable fields

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

searchableProperties.description: Array of field keys that should be searchable (e.g., ["custom_objects.pet.name", "custom_objects.pet.breed"])

tools.name: create_object_record
tools.description: Create a new record in a custom or standard object with properties, owner, and followers

owner.description: Array of user IDs who own this record (limited to 1, only for custom objects)

followers.description: Array of user IDs who follow this record (limited to 10)

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

properties.description: Record properties as key-value pairs (e.g., {"name": "Buddy", "breed": "Golden Retriever"})

tools.name: get_object_record
tools.description: Get a specific record by ID from a custom or standard object

recordId.description: ID of the record to retrieve

tools.name: update_object_record
tools.description: Update an existing record in a custom or standard object

owner.description: Updated array of user IDs who own this record

recordId.description: ID of the record to update

followers.description: Updated array of user IDs who follow this record

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

properties.description: Updated record properties as key-value pairs

tools.name: delete_object_record
tools.description: Delete a record from a custom or standard object

recordId.description: ID of the record to delete

tools.name: search_object_records
tools.description: Search records within a custom or standard object using searchable properties

query.description: Search query using searchable properties (e.g., "name:Buddy" to search for records with name Buddy)

schemaKey.description: Schema key of the object to search in

locationId.description: Location ID (uses default if not provided)

searchAfter.description: Cursor for pagination (returned from previous search)

tools.name: ghl_get_all_associations
tools.description: Get all associations for a sub-account/location with pagination. Returns system-defined and user-defined associations.

skip.description: Number of records to skip for pagination

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return (max 100)

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

tools.name: ghl_create_association
tools.description: Create a new association that defines relationship types between entities like contacts, custom objects, and opportunities.

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

firstObjectLabel.description: Label for the first object in the association (e.g., "student")

secondObjectLabel.description: Label for the second object in the association (e.g., "teacher")

tools.name: ghl_get_association_by_id
tools.description: Get a specific association by its ID. Works for both system-defined and user-defined associations.

associationId.description: The ID of the association to retrieve

tools.name: ghl_update_association
tools.description: Update the labels of an existing association. Only user-defined associations can be updated.

associationId.description: The ID of the association to update

firstObjectLabel.description: New label for the first object in the association

secondObjectLabel.description: New label for the second object in the association

tools.name: ghl_delete_association
tools.description: Delete a user-defined association. This will also delete all relations created with this association.

associationId.description: The ID of the association to delete

tools.name: ghl_get_association_by_key
tools.description: Get an association by its key name. Useful for finding both standard and user-defined associations.

keyName.description: The key name of the association to retrieve

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

tools.name: ghl_get_association_by_object_key
tools.description: Get associations by object keys like contacts, custom objects, and opportunities.

objectKey.description: The object key to search for (e.g., "custom_objects.car", "contact", "opportunity")

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (optional)

tools.name: ghl_create_relation
tools.description: Create a relation between two entities using an existing association. Links specific records together.

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

associationId.description: The ID of the association to use for this relation

firstRecordId.description: ID of the first record (e.g., contact ID if contact is first object in association)

secondRecordId.description: ID of the second record (e.g., custom object record ID if custom object is second object)

tools.name: ghl_get_relations_by_record

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return

recordId.description: The record ID to get relations for

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

associationIds.description: Optional array of association IDs to filter relations

tools.name: ghl_delete_relation
tools.description: Delete a specific relation between two entities.

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

relationId.description: The ID of the relation to delete

tools.name: ghl_get_custom_field_by_id
tools.description: Get a custom field or folder by its ID. Supports custom objects and company (business) fields.

id.description: The ID of the custom field or folder to retrieve

tools.name: ghl_create_custom_field
tools.description: Create a new custom field for custom objects or company (business). Supports various field types including text, number, options, date, file upload, etc.

name.description: Field name (optional for some field types)

url.description: URL associated with the option (only for RADIO type)

options.description: Options for the field (required for SINGLE_OPTIONS, MULTIPLE_OPTIONS, RADIO, CHECKBOX, TEXTBOX_LIST types)

fieldKey.description: Field key. Format: "custom_object.{objectKey}.{fieldKey}" for custom objects. Example: "custom_object.pet.name"

parentId.description: ID of the parent folder for organization

objectKey.description: The object key. Format: "custom_object.{objectKey}" for custom objects. Example: "custom_object.pet"

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

showInForms.description: Whether the field should be shown in forms

maxFileLimit.description: Maximum file limit for uploads (only for FILE_UPLOAD type)

acceptedFormats.description: Allowed file formats for uploads (only for FILE_UPLOAD type)

allowCustomOption.description: Allow users to add custom option values for RADIO type fields

tools.name: ghl_update_custom_field
tools.description: Update an existing custom field by ID. Can modify name, description, options, and other properties.

id.description: The ID of the custom field to update

url.description: URL associated with the option (only for RADIO type)

options.description: Updated options (replaces all existing options - include all options you want to keep)

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

placeholder.description: Updated placeholder text for the field

showInForms.description: Whether the field should be shown in forms

maxFileLimit.description: Updated maximum file limit for uploads

acceptedFormats.description: Updated allowed file formats for uploads

tools.name: ghl_delete_custom_field
tools.description: Delete a custom field by ID. This will permanently remove the field and its data.

id.description: The ID of the custom field to delete

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

tools.name: ghl_create_custom_field_folder
tools.description: Create a new custom field folder for organizing fields within an object.

locationId.description: GoHighLevel location ID (will use default if not provided)

tools.name: create_conversation_ai_agent
tools.description: Create a new AI agent for automated conversations

goal.description: The goal of the agent (e.g., "Assist customers with inquiries")

mode.description: Mode of operation - OFF, SUGGESTIVE, or AUTO_PILOT

channels.description: Communication channels the agent can operate on

waitTime.description: Wait time before agent responds (max 5 for minutes, 300 for seconds)

isPrimary.description: Indicates if this agent is a primary agent

sleepTime.description: Duration of sleep period (required if sleepEnabled is true)

personality.description: Personality traits of the agent (e.g., "Friendly and helpful")

businessName.description: Name of the business the agent represents

instructions.description: Instructions for the agent (e.g., "Provide customer service")

sleepEnabled.description: Indicates if sleep functionality is enabled

waitTimeUnit.description: Unit for wait time - SECONDS or MINUTES

sleepTimeUnit.description: Unit of sleep time - HOURS, MINUTES, or SECONDS (required if sleepEnabled is true)

respondToAudio.description: Allow agent to respond to audio

respondToImages.description: Allow agent to respond to images

knowledgeBaseIds.description: Array of knowledge base IDs associated with this agent

autoPilotMaxMessages.description: Maximum number of messages in auto-pilot mode before requiring human intervention (max: 25, min: 1)

autoPilotMaxMessages.description: Updated maximum messages in auto-pilot mode

tools.description: Permanently delete an AI agent and all its configurations

tools.name: attach_action_to_agent
tools.description: Creates and attaches a new action for an AI agent. Actions define specific tasks or behaviors that the agent can perform, such as booking appointments, sending follow-ups, or collecting information. NOTE: Only name, type, and details are accepted - enabled, description, and order are NOT valid for this endpoint.

name.description: Name of the action (e.g., "Book Appointment", "Trigger a Workflow")

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

details.description:
Action-specific configuration object. Required fields depend on action type:

FOR appointmentBooking:
REQUIRED:
- calendarId (string): Calendar ID for booking
OPTIONAL:
- onlySendLink (boolean): If true, only sends booking link without booking
- triggerWorkflow (boolean): Whether to trigger workflow after booking
- sleepAfterBooking (boolean): Whether to sleep agent after booking
- transferBot (boolean): Whether to transfer to another agent
- rescheduleEnabled (boolean): Allow rescheduling
- cancelEnabled (boolean): Allow cancellation
CONDITIONAL:
- workflowIds (string[]): Required when triggerWorkflow is true
- sleepTimeUnit ('days'|'hours'|'minutes') and sleepTime (number): Required when sleepAfterBooking is true
- transferAgent (string): Required when transferBot is true
NOTE: When onlySendLink is true, triggerWorkflow, sleepAfterBooking, transferBot, rescheduleEnabled, and cancelEnabled must be false

FOR triggerWorkflow:
REQUIRED:
- workflowIds (string[]): Array of workflow IDs
- triggerCondition (string): Condition to trigger
OPTIONAL:
- triggerMessage (string): Message to send when triggering

FOR updateContactField:
REQUIRED:
- contactFieldId (string): Field ID to update
- description (string): Field description
OPTIONAL:
- contactUpdateExamples (string[]): Example values (not required for standard fields, Monetary, or Date custom fields)

FOR stopBot:
REQUIRED:
- stopBotDetectionType ('Goodbye' | 'Custom'): Detection type
- stopBotTriggerCondition (string): Trigger condition
- reactivateEnabled (boolean): Can reactivate
- enabled (boolean): Is enabled
- stopBotExamples (string[]): At least 2 example phrases
- finalMessage (string): Final message when stopping
OPTIONAL:
- tags (string[]): Tags to apply when stopping
CONDITIONAL:
- sleepTimeUnit ('days'|'hours'|'minutes') and sleepTime (number): Required when reactivateEnabled is true

FOR humanHandOver:
REQUIRED:
- enabled (boolean): Is enabled
- triggerCondition (string): Trigger condition
- reactivateEnabled (boolean): Can reactivate
- finalMessage (string): Final message
- handoverType ('contactRequest' | 'lackOfInformation' | 'failedResolvedIssue' | 'custom')
OPTIONAL:
- assignToUserId (string): User ID to assign conversation to
- skipAssignToUser (boolean): Skip assigning to specific user
- createTask (boolean): Create task when handing over
- tags (string[]): Tags to apply during handover
CONDITIONAL:
- examples (string[]): Required when handoverType is 'custom' or 'contactRequest'
- sleepTimeUnit ('days'|'hours'|'minutes') and sleepTime (number): Required when reactivateEnabled is true

FOR advancedFollowup:
REQUIRED:
- enabled (boolean): Is enabled
- scenarioId ('contactStoppedReplying' | 'contactIsBusy' | 'contactRequested'): Scenario trigger
- followupSequence (array): Array of followup steps
FOLLOWUP SEQUENCE ITEM REQUIRED:
- id (number 1-5): Step identifier (must be integer, not string)
- followupTimeUnit ('days' | 'hours' | 'minutes'): Time unit for delay
- followupTime (number): Duration value (minutes: 1-60, hours: 1-24, days: 1-180)
FOLLOWUP SEQUENCE ITEM OPTIONAL:
- aiEnabledMessage (boolean, default true): Use AI to generate message
- triggerWorkflow (boolean, default false): Trigger a workflow
- customMessage (string): Custom message (required when aiEnabledMessage is false)
- workflowId (string): Workflow ID (required when triggerWorkflow is true)
- contactRequested (boolean): Whether contact was requested
OPTIONAL followupSettings:
- dynamicChannelSwitching (boolean, required if settings included): Enable channel switching
- followUpHours (boolean): Respect working hours
- workingHours (array): Working hour definitions
- timezoneToUse ('contact' | 'business'): Timezone source

FOR transferBot:
REQUIRED:
- transferBotType ('Default' | 'Custom'): Transfer type
- transferToBot (string): Agent ID to transfer to
- enabled (boolean): Is enabled
CONDITIONAL (required when transferBotType is 'Custom'):
- transferBotTriggerCondition (string): Condition that triggers transfer
- transferBotExamples (string[]): At least 2 example phrases

tools.name: list_actions_for_agent
tools.description: List all actions attached to an AI agent

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

tools.name: get_action_by_id
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific action

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

tools.name: update_action
tools.description: Update an existing action's configuration. The API accepts type, name, and details as required fields. NOTE: description, order, and enabled fields may be supported by the update endpoint but their acceptance should be verified against the current API version.

order.description: Optional execution order (⚠️ verify API support - may not be accepted by all API versions)

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

details.description: Action-specific configuration object (see attach_action_to_agent for detailed field requirements per action type)

enabled.description: Optional enabled status (⚠️ verify API support - may not be accepted by all API versions)

actionId.description: Unique identifier of the action to update

description.description: Optional description (⚠️ verify API support - may not be accepted by all API versions)

tools.name: delete_action
tools.description: Remove an action from an AI agent

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

actionId.description: Unique identifier of the action to remove

tools.name: update_followup_settings
tools.description: Update the follow-up settings for an action

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the AI agent

enabled.description: Enable or disable follow-ups for this action

delayMinutes.description: Delay in minutes before sending follow-up

maxFollowups.description: Maximum number of follow-ups to send

tools.name: get_generation_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about an AI-generated response including system prompt, conversation history, and knowledge base chunks used

generationId.description: Unique identifier of the AI generation

tools.name: create_voice_ai_agent

name.description: Name of the Voice AI agent

prompt.description: System prompt/instructions for the Voice AI agent

voiceId.description: ID of the voice to use for the agent

firstMessage.description: First message the agent says when answering a call

tools.name: list_voice_ai_agents
tools.description: Retrieve a paginated list of Voice AI agents for the location

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

offset.description: Number of results to skip for pagination

tools.description: Retrieve detailed configuration and settings for a specific Voice AI agent

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the Voice AI agent

tools.description: Partially update an existing Voice AI agent configuration

name.description: Updated name of the Voice AI agent

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the Voice AI agent to update

maxDuration.description: Updated maximum call duration in seconds

tools.name: delete_voice_ai_agent
tools.description: Delete a Voice AI agent and all its configurations

agentId.description: Unique identifier of the Voice AI agent to delete

tools.name: get_user
tools.description: Get user details by ID. Returns user information including name, email, phone, permissions, roles, and scopes.

tools.name: get_users_by_location
tools.description: Get all users for a specific location/sub-account. Returns list of users assigned to the location.

locationId.description: Location/Sub-account ID (required). Example: "s4BtzHFWmT28mbb85uPa"

tools.name: search_users
tools.description: Search users across the company/agency with various filters. Supports searching by name, email, phone, role, type, and more.

ids.description: Comma-separated list of User IDs to filter. Example: "5DP4iH6HLkQsiKESj6rh,5DP4iH6HLkQsiKESj34h"

sort.description: Field to sort by. Default is first and last name. Example: "dateAdded"

query.description: Search term - matches against user full name, email, or phone. Example: "John"

companyId.description: Company/Agency ID to search within (required). Example: "5DP41231LkQsiKESj6rh"

locationId.description: Filter by specific location ID

tools.name: filter_users_by_email
tools.description: Filter users by a list of email addresses. Useful for bulk user lookups by email.

emails.description: Array of email addresses to filter. Example: ["user1@example.com", "user2@example.com"]

projection.description: Fields to return. Use "all" for all fields, or comma-separated field names. Default returns only id and email

tools.name: create_user
tools.description: Create a new user in the system. User will be assigned to specified locations with the given permissions and scopes.

scopes.description: Array of scopes to enable. Example: ["contacts.write", "campaigns.readonly"]

locationIds.description: Array of location IDs to assign user to (required). Example: ["C2QujeCh8ZnC7al2InWR"]

permissions.description: User permissions object with boolean flags for various features (campaignsEnabled, contactsEnabled, etc.)

tools.name: update_user
tools.description: Update user information. Note: Email update is no longer supported due to security reasons.

scopes.description: Updated scopes array. If passed empty, all scopes will be disabled

companyId.description: Company/Agency ID. Required for Agency Level access

emailChangeOTP.description: OTP to change email ID (if email change is needed). Example: "191344"

scopesAssignedToOnly.description: Updated assigned-only scopes. If passed empty, all assigned scopes will be disabled

tools.name: delete_user
tools.description: Delete a user. The deletion is queued and will take effect in a few minutes.
